mapper.select: select suid, deptid, sysname, syspassword, sysnickname, sysemail, systatus, createtime, updatetime, deleted from fruit_sysuser where sysemail = #{sysemail} and syspassword = #{syspassword}

select s.suid, s.sysname, s.sysnickname, s.sysemail, s.systatus, s.sysavaurl, s.deleted, s.createtime, d.deptname, d.sort from fruit_dept as d left join fruit_sysuser as s on s.deptid = d.deptid where s.deleted=0
